          Reads in ${WPS_JOB_OUTPUTS_DIR} the tasks exit message files as exitMessage.[taskId] containing an exit code and an optional exit text; then, for each exit message file found in that directory, merges these files into a table of exit codes and exit texts.

 void JobServiceAssistant.writeComplexInputs(JobImpl jobs, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.w3c.dom.Document> inputDocuments)
          For each input (a list of URL's), it splits the m (XPATH "/ssegrid:URLList/@count") children elements (XPATH "/ssegrid:URLList/ssegrid:url") into n lists of URL's separated by a line feed (n= total number of tasks = jobs.length), then writes the file as [input identifier].[taskId] in ${ WPS_JOB_INPUTS_DIR }.
